plot: Chad Smith is the protagonist in this light-hearted, family-oriented show about a police detective, his wife and their three children.
plot_en: Chad Smith is the protagonist in this light-hearted, family-oriented show about a police detective, his wife and their three children.
plot_es: Chad Smith is the protagonist in this light-hearted, family-oriented show about a police detective, his wife and their three children.
title: The Smith Family
